info.name: REST API Examples (Integration Development Guide)
info.description:
This collection contains examples from the [REST API Examples](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=bbb8b84b-07d7-4a69-adf8-33dc5d430b60) chapter of the Integration Development Guide of Acumatica ERP.

**Testing the Requests**

To test the examples, you configure this collection and the Acumatica ERP instance to be used as follows:

- Deploy a new Acumatica ERP instance with three tenants that are based on the U100, SalesDemo, and T100 datasets. For details on deploying an instance, see [To Deploy an Acumatica ERP Instance](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=b18ad378-0a8c-44f1-a14c-6b4f9c6271e4) in the Installation Guide.
- Specify the base URL of the site in the BaseURL variable of the collection.
- Specify the instance URL in the InstanceURL variable of the collection.
- Make sure the URL of the Default/22.200.001 endpoint is in the EndpointURL variable.
- Make sure the URL of the MANUFACTURING/22.200.001 endpoint is in the ManufacturingEndpointURL variable.
- Specify the tenant name, branch, username, and password to access the tenant with the U100 data in the TenantU100, BranchU100, UsernameU100, and PasswordU100 variables.
- Specify the tenant name, branch, username, and password to access the tenant with the T100 data in the TenantT100, BranchT100, UsernameT100, and PasswordT100 variables.
- Specify the tenant name, branch, username, and password to access the tenant with the T100 data in the TenantSalesDemo, BranchSalesDemo, UsernameSalesDemo, and PasswordSalesDemo variables.
    

Other variables are used by particular requests and are specified during execution of other requests as follows:

- caseEntityID is specified by Create a Case and is used by Create an Activity that is Linked to a Case.
- customerEntityID is specified by Create a Customer and is used by Create an Activity that is Linked to a Customer.
- leadEntityID is specified by Create a Lead and is used by Create an Activity that is Linked to a Lead.
- paymentRefNbr, appliedToDocuments, appliedToOrders are specified by Create an Accounts Receivable Payment for an Invoice and a Sales Order and is used by Release an Accounts Receivable Payment.
- proFormaReferenceNbr is specified by Retrieve the List of Pro Forma Invoices of a Project and is used by Send a Pro Forma Invoice by Email.
- purchaseReceiptID is specified by Create a Purchase Receipt and is used by Release a Purchase Receipt.
- shipmentID and packageID are specified by and used in Write the Tracking Number to a Shipment.

item.name: Basic Requests
Sign In to the Service

request.description: This example shows how to sign in to Acumatica ERP. This process is described in [Sign-In to the Service](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=0322492a-de9b-4443-b256-923c48aff31d).

response.name: Sign In to the Service (U100)

item.name: Sign Out from the Service

request.description: This example shows how to sign out from Acumatica ERP. This process is described in [Sign-Out from the Service](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=f6701ec1-2296-4155-8242-03d29006bf6e).

response.name: Sign Out from the Service

exec: //Sign in to the tenant with U100 data

item.name: Attach a File to a Record: Get the URL for Attaching a File

request.description: This example shows the attachment of a file to a record, which is described in [Attach a File to a Record](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=591def3d-5fe5-42c1-bb35-cfe5b4c77f6f).

response.name: Attach a File to a Record: Get the URL for Attaching a File

item.name: Attach a File to a Record

request.description: This example shows the attachment of a file to a record, which is described in [Attach a File to a Record](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=591def3d-5fe5-42c1-bb35-cfe5b4c77f6f).

response.name: Attach a File to a Record

item.name: Retrieve the Schema of Custom Fields

request.description: This example shows the retrieval of the schema of custom fields, which is described in [Retrieve the Schema of Custom Fields](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=64daacf1-75c4-4bfa-b57b-36222020e7c9).

response.name: Retrieve the Schema of Custom Fields

item.name: Retrieve a Record with Custom Fields

request.description: This example shows the retrieval of a user-defined field PRODUCT added to the Sales Order form, which is described in [Retrieve a Record with Custom Fields](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=01266cc0-6eb1-4e41-b049-246e5915496d).

response.name: Retrieve a Record with Custom Fields

item.name: Create a Record with Custom Fields

request.description: This example shows the creation of a sales order with the user-defined field PRODUCT, which is described in [Createe a Record with Custom Fields](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=6397c034-d191-4302-8f9d-0a0aec5b5ba8).

response.name: Create a Record with Custom Fields

item.name: Change the Business Date or Current Branch

request.description: This example shows how to set the active branch and business date for a request. This process is described in [Change the Business Date or Current Branch](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=9821cff9-4970-4153-a0f8-dbf5758133a7).

response.name: Change the Business Date or Current Branch

item.name: Retrieve the Acumatica ERP Version and the List of Endpoints

request.description: This example obtains the Acumatica ERP version and the list of contract-based endpoints available in this version by using the REST API. This example is described in [Retrieve the Acumatica ERP Version and the List of Endpoints](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=da0fe495-b2e5-4d34-ab5a-5829e408f684).

response.name: Retrieve the Acumatica ERP Version and the List of Endpoints

item.name: Specify Localized Values of a Multi-Language Field

request.description: This example shows the specification of localized values of a multi-language field, which is described in [Specify Localized Values of a Multi-Language Field](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=33e74dc8-aad3-4fb0-b3ac-e8ecaf323578).

response.name: Specify Localized Values of a Multi-Language Field

item.name: Retrieve Localized Values of a Multi-Language Field

request.description: This example shows the retrieval of localized values of a multi-language field, which is described in [Retrieve Localized Values of a Multi-Language Field](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=44710da9-8e91-4836-92eb-d20a32a5dca6).

response.name: Retrieve Localized Values of a Multi-Language Field

item.name: Retrieve Localized Values of a Multi-Language Field: Retrieve the Localized Values for All Fields

request.description: This example shows the retrieval of all localized values of all multi-language fields, which is described in [Retrieve Localized Values of a Multi-Language Field](https://help.acumatica.com/Help?ScreenId=ShowWiki&pageid=44710da9-8e91-4836-92eb-d20a32a5dca6).

response.name: Retrieve Localized Values of a Multi-Language Field: Retrieve the Localized Values for All Fields
